tweet: A creeping thought that I've been entertaining for the past few days is the how much sense an AAPL/MSFT merger makes. The more I think about it, the more sense it makes.
Crazy story by Bloomberg on Amazon, Apple, etc being infiltrated by Chinese spy chips. To be honest, this story was coming, true or not.
Folks should stop with the whole "evil" thing on this... isn't it better that Google has a slice of Chinese search vs. Tencent/Baidu/et al? All else equal?
